import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.scss'] }) export class MenuComponent { constructor(public authService: AuthService) {} logout(){ this.authService.logout() } }
